Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 35th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1981...
Injured on 7/17/1982 with a Stiff Neck, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 8/1/1986, off Bruce Sutter (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/1987, off Steve Farr (STL)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (A) on 1/31/1988 (Going to CHC: P B. Smith. Going to NYY: LF M. Young, 3B M. Funderburk, P D. Stieb, P B. Burns, C I. Calderon)...
